item.title: Leading in Crisis by Handry Satriago - CEO GE Indonesia (ID)
item.description: Situasi dunia di tengah serbuan Virus Corona dan dampak ekonominya (sekarang dan nanti), membuat saya teringat berbagai pengalaman saya dan pelajaran dari orang-orang lain yang mengajarkan saya tentang bagaimana leader menghadapi krisis.

item.title: Leader and Trust (ID)
item.description: Menjadi pemimpin dalam sebuah tim tidak harus selalu mengedepankan kekuasaan dalam memberikan komando tetapi juga memberikan kepercayaan kepada anggota tim

item.title: Find and Kill Process Locking on Mac's Specific Port
item.description: It happens multiple times when We running application with spesific port but the port is used and our application failed to start.

item.title: [Video] Microservice Architecture With Java (Public Speaking at TIA PDC'18)
item.description: Tech in Asia Product Development Conference 2018 is a unique two days conference which brings together developer community, thought leaders and successful practitioners of product development.

item.title: Remove All git Files From a Directory Recursively
item.description: The .git folder is tipically stored in the root directory of the repository, not all the sub-directories like Subversion did.

item.title: Delete .DS_Store Recursively
item.description: In the Apple macOS operating system, .DS_Store is a file that stores custom attributes of its containing folder

item.title: Reset MySQL root Password on Ubuntu 16.04
item.description: If You assigned a root password previously but have forgotten it, You can assign a new password manually so You do not get locked.

item.title: Check jQuery Version
